title: My fps has lowered drastically.
body: Ever since the winter update my fps has dropped and it has become such a nuisance because ive had to deal with it for 4 months now. the queue pops, i pick my champ and we load in fine. iim in fountain and i get around 70-90 fps, i reach lane and it lowers to about 50-60 which is still playable. then minions reach lane and it drops all the way down to 20 fps. that is super unplayable. imagine having to farm off of that. and its still not over. No, when i get into late game it stays at a constant 10-15 fps and i dont even want to get started on team fights. So  i hopped in a chat with a riot support member and we went through a clean reinstallation. nothing has worked. i repeated the steps he gave me at lest 4 times now and nothing seems to fix it. there are many threads that arent being acknowledged on this issue and there are many posts on reddit. i can provide my LoLLogs file from the hextech repair tool to let you see whats going on. my drivers are up to date and so is my pc. i just want to know why im having these problems.

replies.body: Your hardware or drivers could be having some issues or just outdated, which can cause drops like the ones you're reporting.  The clean reinstall was a good step, in case any bad game files were failing to render the game properly.  My suggestion in tis case would be to go over each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  This will help tune up your pc as well as rule out possibilities.  I hope that helps!
my drivers are up to date as i said in my post. guess i have to make that clear a second time. ive already gone through the guide. i need a solution. none of this is working.

Sorry about that, I didn't see that you had already created a post on this in another thread.   Usually, a reply to the same thread will ping that it's been updated with a response and help prevent confusion.  :D  That said, It's important to make sure that all of these are covered to rule out possibilities.  If the guide didn't work then reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Since you've already gotten logs, attach it to your ticket for that context.  We'll get back to you.
i created a ticket however i didnt attatch my Logs. ill try that. i hope i get a good response. thank you for your time.
